column4: Is there anyone in here that has an AMD-FX series processor that has sucessfully installed 12.04 LTS?
on my FX-8520 (up to 8550) I use Gentoo. Only last gcc can create good perfomance.
I can't get any linux kernel to boot though, it's hanging shortly after proc detection.
I use MSI and all work good. hm...
are you also using an ssd drive?
one moment i think i might have just thought of an answer to an unasked question. :D
ok so now it hangs on the drive detection, should i chance updating my ssd firmware?
i have only one problem with ssd
i connect to on board RAID SATA and SSD strange work (or not work)
so you haven't updated your ssd's firmware since purchase?
Are you set up as your ssd being in raid mode?
